sqlQuery.name: AllOrganisms
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT t.name AS display, t.three_letter_abbrev AS term, t.three_letter_abbrev AS internal, (SELECT three_letter_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon p WHERE p.orthomcl_taxon_id = t.parent_id) AS parentTerm FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon t

sqlQuery.name: PfamTypeAhead
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, dr.primary_identifier || ' : ' || dr.secondary_identifier AS term, dr.primary_identifier || ' : ' || dr.secondary_identifier || ' ' || dr.remark AS display, dr.secondary_identifier,dr.remark FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed, ApidbTuning.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE lower(ed.name) like '%pfam%' AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND tac.option_id = dr.primary_identifier ORDER BY lower(dr.secondary_identifier),lower(dr.remark)
